messages.message:
Full Time .Net Developer

Dear Brian, 

Please ignore if this has reached you in error!

My name is Deb and I’m an IT Recruiter with MISource Staffing. I wanted to reach out to you today because I had come across your resume online and thought you would be interested in an opportunity I have available right now. I have provided the quick details for the role at the end of this email. Please reply with your updated resume if you are interested.

Full Time .Net Developer
Salt Lake City, UT
US Citizens and Green Card Holders only! 
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES OF THIS POSITION ARE:
•	Develop and maintain user interface controls, business logic, and SQL Server stored procedures
•	Participate on agile team to estimate and groom backlog items, plan development activities, and improve the development process
•	Develop functionality using the iSolved coding standards
•	Work with business analysts to clarify requirements and debug problems
•	Investigate third-level support requests
CORE SKILLS & EXPERIENCE
•	2+ years developing web-applications
•	Ability to work independently to research and solve complex problems
•	Strong skills with: 
1.	ASP.Net
2.	C#
3.	JavaScript
4.	SQL
•	Experience with: 
1.	jQuery
2.	Knockout
3.	LINQ
4.	CSS
Experience with large (500+ database table) system development a plus

Deb
deb@misource.com
